meanings.definition: A woman who works in advertising.
meanings.sent1: The adwoman created a catchy slogan for the new campaign.
meanings.sent2: The adwoman presented her ideas for the commercial to the client.
meanings.sent3: The adwoman accidentally spilled coffee on the storyboard, creating a new abstract art piece.
meanings.sent4: She was a true adwoman, painting pictures with words and images to sell products.
meanings.sent5: The adwoman's creativity knew no bounds as she crafted compelling ads for various brands.

meanings.definition: To promote or sell a product or service through advertising.
meanings.sent1: She decided to adwoman the new product by creating a vibrant ad campaign.
meanings.sent2: The company hired her to adwoman their latest line of skincare products.
meanings.sent3: He adwomaned the idea of a talking dog in the commercial, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to adwoman effectively made her the go-to person for marketing strategies.
meanings.sent5: The team brainstormed ways to adwoman the upcoming event to attract a larger audience.
